description: Detects potentially suspicious CommandLine of electron apps (teams, discord, slack, etc.). This could be a sign of abuse to proxy execution through a signed binary.
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potentially Suspicious Electron Application CommandLine
query: (event.category:process AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Kk][Ee][Yy][Bb][Aa][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Ww][Ee][Bb][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]2\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ll][Aa][Cc][Kk]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\-\-[Bb][Rr][Oo][Ww][Ss][Ee][Rr]\-[Ss][Uu][Bb][Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh].*/ OR /.*\-\-[Gg][Pp][Uu]\-[Ll][Aa][Uu][Nn][Cc][Hh][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\-\-[Rr][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr][Ee][Rr]\-[Cc][Mm][Dd]\-[Pp][Rr][Ee][Ff][Ii][Xx].*/ OR /.*\-\-[Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll][Ii][Tt][Yy]\-[Cc][Mm][Dd]\-[Pp][Rr][Ee][Ff][Ii][Xx].*/))
